programme.title: Crossword Mysteries
programme.desc: During Tess' birthday celebration, the headlining magician at the Magic Manor winds up dead, and Tess and Logan find themselves swept up in a world where things aren't always what they appear to be.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Blanche try to help Rose overcome a 30-year dependency on prescription medication.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy takes Sophia to Disney World for quality time; Rose and Blanche write a children's book.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose finally gets to confront her fantasy that Bob Hope is her father.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia invests her roommates' money in a prizefighter named "Kid Pepe" who is a gifted violinist.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and her former tennis rival play practical jokes during a reunion.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Blanche try to help Rose overcome a 30-year dependency on prescription medication.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba finds the perfect first home for Cheyenne and Van, but Cheyenne discovers that her high-school rival is selling it.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra tells Reba and Brock that she is postponing college to tour with her band; Cheyenne and Van cannot agree on how to decorate their new house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba drops by Cheyenne and Van's house unexpectedly; Barbra Jean has a meltdown during her weather report.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van and Cheyenne must move back in with Reba after he starts a fire at their house; Barbra Jean considers a job offer.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's audience is left to guess who his "dirty girl" is when he and Kate have a tryst during a broadcast.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles shows up on Frasier's doorstep when his relationship with Maris hits a low.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frantic to buy a Christmas gift for his son, Frasier ventures into a mall for the first time in his life.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: On the advice of his friends, Frasier declares his love for Kate (Mercedes Ruehl) -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The rivalry between Cheers and the Old Towne Tavern, now under new ownership, continues; Rebecca gets a make-over.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Norm and Cliff go to Burbank after Cliff is convinced that Johnny Carson will be using one of his jokes.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that her husband is leaving her for his pregnant girlfriend and that her 17-year-old daughter is pregnant as well.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba takes a stand when a pregnant Cheyenne is kicked out of high school but Van is allowed to stay to help the football team make the championships.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that her daughter's obstetrician will also be delivering the baby of her ex-husband's mistress.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne tries to hide her morning sickness from Van; Reba's neighbor refuses to let her son sleep over.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose thinks her visiting sister is trying to steal her friends.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia and Rose help a friend escape from an inadequate nursing home.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Flashbacks recall previous attempts by the roommates to lose weight.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia learns that the hospital may have switched Dorothy at birth with another baby.

programme.title: Baby, It's Cold Inside
programme.desc: When a travel agent who is up for a promotion is directed to forgo her tropical vacation and visit the world-famous Ice Hotel, she discovers her sacrifices are more than compensated.

programme.title: Love on Iceland
programme.desc: Seeking inspiration for work, Chloe gathers her college travel group back together for a trip to Iceland. When her ex shows up uninvited, sparks fly.

programme.title: A Winter Getaway
programme.desc: A man finds romance with a concierge after he's mistaken for a millionaire during a once-in-a-lifetime trip.

programme.title: Winter Castle
programme.desc: Jenny feels an instant attraction to the handsome best man, Craig, at her sister's wedding. But her hopes of romance are quickly dashed when she is introduced to Craig's plus one, Lana.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: A Merry Scottish Christmas
programme.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad Morgan travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother Jo, a big family secret is revealed.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: The Finnish Line
programme.desc: Anya, inspired by her father's legacy, competes in Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival, and her own anxieties.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: Nell's last stop on a nationwide book tour takes her to Springdale, the hometown of Emmett, a young man she met while both were junior copy editors at a New York publishing company.

programme.title: Christmas in Vienna
programme.desc: A dispirited concert violinist travels to Vienna for a performance and finds the inspiration she has been missing.

programme.title: Never Been Chris'd
programme.desc: Home for the holidays, BFFs Naomi and Liz reconnect with high school crush Chris Silver. A complex love triangle forms, forcing them to take stock of their lives and find the value of friendship.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: Department store employee Noelle visits Christmases of past, present and future as her guardian angel helps her navigate her wishes for a connection with her father, her dream career and love.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A tabloid reporter races to find juicy gossip on a prominent political family. She ends up spending the week before Christmas with the family and falls for one of their sons.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru. Stars Rhiannon Fish and Alec Santos.
